desc.eng: The art of armoured hand-to-hand combat, based on tactical wisdoms bastardised from the Codex Astartes.
The ruthless training regime of the Tempestus Scions, the elite shock troops of the Astra Militarum.
The tactical knowledge accumulated by the Adeptus Arbites through enforcing Imperial law over a million of planets.
The mastery of toxins from the notoriously secretive Venenum Temple of the Officio Assassinorum.
The twisted art obssessed with the violent extinction of life, offered as a sacrifice to the God-Emperor of Mankind.
The survival knowledge accumulated by jungle warfare experts of the Astra Militarum, originating from a notable death world.
The regenerative bio-implants and techno-rites provided by the Genetor division of the Adeptus Mechanicus.
Sanctioned implants and neuro-injected protocols for field agents of the Holy Ordo.
Siege and mass destruction warfare from the Death Corps of Krieg regiments of the Astra Militarum.
Highly restricted, speed boosting cybernetics from the Skitarii Legions of the Adeptus Mechnicus.
Damage mitigation and evasion protocols from the elite honour guard of the Collegia Titanica.
Invigorating techno-psalms and survival rites from the Order Hospitaller sisters of the Adepta Sororitas.
Shock and terror tactics from the secretive Eversor Temple of the Officio Assassinorum.
Sacred modifications and maintenance rites for heat and energy weapons.
Anatomical secrets and injury protocols from the butcher-chirurgeons of the Inquisition.
The art of ranged murder from the secretive Vindicare Temple of the Officio Assassinorum.
Sanctioned psychic powers from the Scholastica Psykana division of the Adeptus Astra Telepathica.
Sanctioned psychic powers from the Battle-Psyker division of the Astra Militarum.
Inquisitors who choose to use xeno-tech and the powers of the Warp to do their work are considered radicals.
Inquisitors who rigidly follow the Imperial Creed are considered Puritans.

Desc.eng: Increases Melee damage by {damage}.
Increases Melee damage by {per_target_damage_bonus,100} when the target is Slowed, Shocked, Stunned or Frozen.
Increases Critical Hit Chance with Melee skills by {critical_hit_chance_hardcap,100}.
Critical Hits in Melee provide [ff2bede6]+1[/ff2bede6] stacking Vulnerability to the target. The Vulnerability type is based on the Melee skill.
Grants [ff2bede6]20%[/ff2bede6] damage bonus to Melee skills when HP drops below 50%.
Grants {damage} damage bonus to Melee skills in single combat (with no more than one opponent within 5 meters).
Grants {damage} damage bonus to Melee skills when facing more than 3 opponents within 5 meters.
Grants {suppression_damage} Suppression damage bonus for Fleshbane attacks.
Grants {critical_hit_chance_hardcap,100} Critical Hit Chance bonus to Combo skills.
Successful Deflects provide a stacking [ff2bede6]5%[/ff2bede6] damage bonus to the next attack (maximum 50%).
All Melee kills grant +20% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.
All Melee kills restore +50 HP.
Dodge moves grant +20% Damage for 3 seconds.
Grants a stacking [ff2bede6]5%[/ff2bede6] damage bonus to Melee skills (up to 50%) as long as there is less than 2 seconds between each Melee attack.
Grants {damage} damage bonus to Ranged skills.
Grants {critical_hit_chance_hardcap,100} Critical Hit Chance bonus with Ranged skills.
Increases Ranged skill damage by {per_target_damage_bonus,100} when target is Slowed, Shocked, Stunned or Frozen.
Grants {cooldown_rate} Ranged skill Cooldown bonus when fighting from cover (for skills with longer than 1 second Cooldown).
Grants a {reload_time} reload time bonus for Ammo fed weapons.
Grants {damage} damage bonus to Ranged skills when there is no enemy present within 5 meters.
Grants [ff2bede6]5%[/ff2bede6] damage bonus to Rapid Fire skills. Every Rapid Fire attack increases Movement Speed by [ff2bede6]10%[/ff2bede6] for 2 seconds.
Shortens the cooling time of overheated weapons by {overheat_cooling_rate}.
Increases Critical Hit Chance for Channeled skills by {critical_hit_chance_hardcap,100}. Provides {charge_time_limit} second charging time bonus to Barrage.
Increases Salvo skill damage by {damage}. Provides {dodge_chance_hardcap,100} Deflection bonus when Salvo skills are in use.
+5% Movement Speed while using Heavy Weapons.
Skill cooldowns are reduced by 50% after switching weapons.
+7% damage with ranged Armor Piercing and Armor Breaking skills.
Grants [ff2bede6]5%[/ff2bede6] Ranged and [ff2bede6]10%[/ff2bede6] Suppression damage bonus for [ff2bede6]3[/ff2bede6] seconds when the opponent is hit by Single Target skills.
Increases Suppression damage by {suppression_damage}.
Grants {damage} damage bonus to Armour Breaking, Armour Piercing and Shield Piercing attacks.
Increases the duration of Slow, Shock, Freeze and Stun by {skill_duration}.
Grants {crowd_control} bonus to Shock and Slow effects.
Increases the duration of Blind by {skill_duration} seconds.
Grants a Shock debuff to targets that were affected by Stun, Blind, or Knockdown.
Targets affected by Knockback or Knockdown suffer [ff2bede6]20%[/ff2bede6] damage penalty for 10 seconds.
Targets suffer [ff2bede6]3%[/ff2bede6] extra damage penalty for every point of stacked Vulnerability bestowed upon them.
Grants {suppression_damage} Suppression damage bonus to Armour Breaking, Armour Piercing and Shield Piercing attacks.
Grants [ff2bede6]10%[/ff2bede6] damage bonus on targets affected by Slow. Increases duration of Slow by [ff2bede6]1[/ff2bede6] second.
Restores 10% of maximum Suppression Resist when Stunning or Knocking Down opponents.
Deflected melee attackers lose 10% of their maximum Suppression resistance.
+5% Critical Strength for every debuff effect on the target.
Grants a stacking [ff2bede6]1%[/ff2bede6] damage bonus for each debilitating effect on the target (stacked vulnerabilities are counted as multiple effects).
Increases DoT damage by {dot_damage}.
{dot_damage} of the character's Heat Resist value is gained as bonus percentage to Burn damage.
Increases the duration of all Bleed effects by {skill_duration} seconds.
Poisoned opponents suffer a non-stacking [ff2bede6]20%[/ff2bede6] damage penalty for the duration of the effect.
Engine and Armoured type creatures suffer {dot_damage} more Corrosion damage.
Burn effects last +1 sec longer and block HP regeneration
Bleeding enemies are Slowed aswell.
Duration of Poison, Burn and Bleed effects are halved.
Grants a stacking {per_target_damage_bonus,100} damage bonus for every active DoT effect on the target.
Increases Critical Hit Chance by {critical_hit_chance,100}.
Increases Critical Hit strength by {critical_hit_strength}.
Critical Hits provide [ff2bede6]+1[/ff2bede6] bonus Focus point.
Grants {critical_hit_chance_hardcap,100} Critical Hit Chance bonus with Melee skills.
Grants {critical_hit_chance_hardcap,100} Critical Hit Chance bonus with Ranged skills.
Critical Hits provide {critical_suppression_damage} Suppression damage bonus.
Every attack increases Critical Hit Chance by [ff2bede6]1%[/ff2bede6]. The bonus resets when a Critical Hit is dealt.
Every Critical Hit dealt heals the character for [ff2bede6]1%[/ff2bede6] of max HP.
Grants {critical_hit_chance,100} Critical Hit Chance bonus, but reduces damage by {damage_reduce}.
+5% Critical Chance if the character's Suppression status is yellow, and +10% when red.
+5% Critical Chance if the character's Suppression status is green.
+2% Critical Hit Chance for every enemy within Melee range.
Grants a stacking [ff2bede6]10%[/ff2bede6] damage bonus (up to 100%) for [ff2bede6]10[/ff2bede6] seconds when a Critical Hit results a kill.
Grants {damage} damage bonus if the character's Suppression status is green.
Grants {damage_reduce_hardcap} damage reduction bonus if the character's Suppression status is green.
Grants {hp_regeneration} HP per second Regeneration bonus if the character's Suppression status is green.
Grants {damage_reduce_hardcap} DoT damage reduction bonus if the character's Suppression status is green.
Reduces skill Cooldown by [ff2bede6]1[/ff2bede6] second when the character is hit (skills with Cooldown longer than 3 seconds only).
Grants {critical_hit_chance_hardcap,100} Critical Hit Chance bonus if the character's Suppression status is green.
+3 Movement Speed if the character's Suppression status is green.
Dodging regenerates 3% of maximum Suppression if the character's Suppression status is green.
Grants a non-stacking [ff2bede6]20%[/ff2bede6] damage and [ff2bede6]10%[/ff2bede6] damage reduction bonus for [ff2bede6]1[/ff2bede6] second whenever the character is hit in Suppression status green.
Grants {hp_max} bonus HP.
Grants {suppression_resist_max} bonus Suppression.
Whenever the character's max HP is reduced below [ff2bede6]25%[/ff2bede6], Inoculator Cooldown resets to zero.
Regenerates {hp_regeneration} HP per second if the character's HP is below 50%.
Heals the character for [ff2bede6]1[/ff2bede6] HP for every [ff2bede6]10[/ff2bede6] Suppression point regained.
With every successful Deflect, [ff2bede6]5[/ff2bede6] Suppression points are regained.
Grants {damage_reduce_hardcap} damage reduction bonus if the character's Suppression status is red.
Regenerates {suppression_regeneration_percent,100} Suppression per second if the character's HP is below 50%.
For every [ff2bede6]10[/ff2bede6] HP healed the character regains [ff2bede6]1[/ff2bede6] Suppression point.
Enemy attacks do -20% Suppression Damage until the character is over 50% of max HP.
Each successful Dodge or Dodge Move regenerates +25 Suppression points.
Regenerates +10 HP and +10 Suppression Resist per second while the character is on the move.
Grants [ff2bede6]10%[/ff2bede6] max HP and [ff2bede6]10%[/ff2bede6] max Suppression bonus.
{damage} damage for all single target skills.
{suppression_damage} Suppression damage for single target skills.
{damage} damage for all single target melee skills.
{damage} damage for all single target ranged skill.
{damage} damage for all skills with more than 1 sec cooldown remaining.
{per_target_damage_bonus,100} damage and Suppression damage bonus vs enemies below 30% HP (Single Target skills only).
Enemies losing 50% or more HP from a Single Target attack are knocked down
Every one hit kill restores 10% of max HP (Single Target skills only).
{per_target_suppression_damage_bonus,100} Suppression damage bonus to Single Target attacks (when hitting same target with the same skill).
Killing with a Single Target attack reduces the skill's cooldown by 30%.
The first attack with a Single Target skill grants +5% Critical Hit Chance.
{per_target_damage_bonus,100} damage with Single Target skills against Slowed, Shocked, Stunned or Frozen enemies.
{per_target_damage_bonus,100} damage with Single Target skills vs Medium, Commander and Elite enemies.
{per_target_damage_bonus,100} damage with Single Target skills vs unmoving targets.
One hit kills with Single Target skills grant +20% damage and +10% damage reduction bonus for 10 seconds.
{damage} damage to all Area of Effect skills.
{suppression_damage} Suppression damage to all Area of Effect skills.
{area_extent_bonus,100} increased area for all Area of Effect skills.
{aoe_damage_bonus_per_target,100}% damage to all Area of Effect skills after each enemy within their area of effect.
{damage} damage to all area effect Melee skills.
{damage} damage to all area effect Ranged skill.
{critical_hit_strength} Critical Strength to all Area of Effect skills.
{damage} damage to all Grenade skills.
Effect radius for Aura skills increased by {area_extent_bonus,100}.
Effect range for Cone skills and Line skills increased by {area_extent_bonus,100}.
Area effect kills restore +100 Suppression points each
{skill_duration} second duration to damage over time effects (Area of Effect skills only).
{damage} damage bonus to Mine skills.
All area effect hits reduce the skill's cooldown by 4%, kills grant a 8% reduction (for AoE skills with longer than 1 sec cooldown only).
{movement_speed} Movement Speed.
{cooldown} cooldown bonus for skills with longer than 1 sec cooldown.
{movement_speed} Movement Speed bonus (for one-handed weapons only).
{damage_reduce_hardcap} damage reduction when moving for more than 2 secs.
{movement_speed} Movement Speed when not in combat.
Dropping below 25% of max HP resets the cooldown of all movement skills.
Dealing critical hits reduces skill cooldowns by 10% (for cooldowns longer than 1 sec only).
{cooldown} cooldown reduction to all skills with cooldowns longer than 1 sec.
Grants immunity to Slow, Stun, Shock and Freeze when HP drops below 25%.
Kills grant +20% Movement Speed bonus for 5 seconds.
Using movement skills grant {damage_reduce_hardcap}% damage reduction for 10 seconds. Stacks for a maximum of 5.
{critical_hit_chance_hardcap,100} Critical Hit Chance and Critical Strength bonus when not taking damage for at least 3 seconds.
All successful Deflects reduce skill cooldowns by 5%.
Dodge moves cost {resource_cost} less Adrenaline.
When taking damage, all skill cooldowns over 1 seconds are reduced by the percentage of HP lost from your max HP.
{heat_resist}% Heat Resistance.
{physical_resist}% Physical Resistance.
{warp_resist}% Warp Resistance.
Damage reduction by armour is increased by {item_damage_reduce}.
{damage_reduce_hardcap}% damage reduction in cover.
{damage_reduce}% damage reduction.
{damage_reduce_hardcap}% damage reduction when standing still.
+50% Deflect bonus from shields.
Slow and Shock effects are reduced by {crowd_control_resist}.
Covers block 50% more penetrating attacks.
Increases energy shield effectiveness by {shield_efficiency}.
5% damage reduction for 10 secs whenever Focus points are spent.
{dodge_chance,100} Dodge.
Any damage that would normally kill the character is reduced by 80%. Upon survival, +200 HP regeneration per second and +20% damage bonus is granted for 10 seconds.
25% of incoming damage is substracted from Suppression Resistance instead of Health.

Desc_crusader.eng: {cooldown_hardcap} cooldown for skills using the Focus resource.

Desc_assassin.eng: {cooldown_hardcap} cooldown for skills using the Adrenaline resource.

Desc_psyker.eng: {cooldown_hardcap} cooldown for skills generating Warp Heat.

Desc.eng: {medkit_capacity} Inoculator Capacity.
{medkit_cooldown} Inoculator cooldown.
Grenades have {belt_starting_amount} more charges.
Inoculators heal {medkit_heal} more HP.

Desc_crusader.eng: Every Focus point spent heals you for {hp_per_resource_spent,100} of your maximum HP.

Desc_assassin.eng: Every Adrenaline point spent heals you for {hp_per_resource_spent,100} of your maximum HP.

Desc_psyker.eng: Every point of Warp Heat gained heals you for {hp_per_resource_spent,100} of your maximum HP.

Desc.eng: Energy Fields have {belt_starting_amount} more charges and {cooldown_hardcap} cooldown.
Regeneration boost for {hp_regeneration} HP per second while the Inoculator is on cooldown.
{damage} damage bonus vs Surprised enemies.
Mines have {belt_starting_amount} more charges.

Desc_crusader.eng: Inoculator use restores {resource_per_inoculator_use_percent,100} of missing Focus.

Desc_assassin.eng: Inoculator use restores {resource_per_inoculator_use_percent,100} of missing Adrenaline.

Desc_psyker.eng: Inoculator use lowers Warp Heat by {resource_per_inoculator_use_percent,100}.

Desc.eng: Bonuses granted by Executions last 20% longer.
{execute_chance}% Execution chance.
Enemies within 10 meters lose 25% of max Suppression when an Execution is completed.
Kills with Critical Hits have increased chance to turn into Executions.
Executing an enemy heals 20% of maximum HP instantly.
Enemies within 10 meters suffer 30% damage reduction for 10 seconds when an Execution is completed.
Executions grant a 10% damage bonus for 10 seconds.
Executions restore 10% max HP and 10% max Suppression Resist.
Executions restore 10 Adrenaline points.
Enemies within 10 meters suffer Shock and lose 25% of max Suppression when an Execution is completed.
{heat_damage} Heat Damage.
Energy and heat weapons deal 10-20% extra damage when their Overheat bar is over 50% (damage increases with overheat rate).
Energy and heat weapons generate {overheat} less heat.
{damage} Damage and {critical_hit_chance_hardcap,100} Critical Chance bonus to energy and heat weapons.
Critical hits with energy and heat weapons bestow a stacking Heat vulnerability upon the target.
Overheated weapons cool down {overheat_cooling_rate,100} faster.
Discharging an energy or heat weapon with zero Overheat bestows a Burn effect upon the target.
Critical hits with energy and heat weapons bestow a Burn effect upon the target.
{physical_damage} Physical Damage.
{critical_hit_strength} Critical Strength for skills with Physical Damage.
Bleeding effects last {skill_duration} sec longer.
{damage} damage to all skills dealing Physical Damage with less than 1 second cooldown.
Critical Hits dealt with Physical Damage bestows a stacking physical vulnerability upon the target.
{per_target_damage_bonus,100} damage against Bleeding enemies.
Critical Hits dealt with Physical Damage bestows a Slow effect upon the target.
Physical attacks grant a stacking {per_target_damage_bonus,100} damage bonus (up to 50%, maximum one token per seconds). Attacking a different target negates the bonus.
{damage} damage for Aimed and Sniper skills.
All Aimed and Sniper shots cause Slow.
{critical_hit_chance_hardcap,100} Critical Hit Chance for Aimed and Sniper skills.
{critical_hit_strength} Critical Strength for Aimed and Sniper skills.
+30% damage for headshots performed with Aimed and Sniper skills.
Slow and Shock effects caused by Aimed and Sniper skills last {skill_duration} sec longer.
Aimed shots have 25% chance to cause Knockdown.
The maximum aiming time with all Sniper skills are reduced to 2 seconds.
Kills performed with an Aimed or Sniper skill have +5% chance to grant the Execution bonus.
{damage_reduce} Melee damage reduction
-2 Warp Heat per psyker Melee weapon skill used
+10% Ranged damage with Pistols for 10 seconds when a Psyker skill is used
-5% Warp Heat cost for Ranged psyker skills
+3% Critical Hit Chance for every Debuff effect on the target
-1 Warp Heat for every Debuff effect on the target
-20% damage penalty to Burning opponents (non-stacking)
+5% Critical Hit Chance at maximum Warp Heat
-1 Warp Heat for every Critical Hit dealt
+3% Resist All bonus if the character's Suppression status is green
-50% Warp Heat cost if the character is below 25% of max HP
+25 Suppression Resist for every Warp Heat point lost
{per_target_damage_bonus,100} damage to Single Target skills at maximum Warp Heat
{warpheat_free_chance,100} to not generate Warp Heat with Single Target skills
{damage,100} damage to Area Effect skills at maximum Warp Heat
{damage} Warp damage to Area Effect skills
+10% Movement speed bonus for 5 seconds when a psyker skill is used (non-stacking)
10% faster cooldown to psyker skills (already on cooldown) when Force weapons are used (stacking)
Invulnerability for 3 seconds when the character's status changes to Exposed
{item_dodge_chance,100} bonus to Deflect with Force Swords
-20% Warp Heat cost to psyker skills mounted on the support slot
{resource_per_inoculator_use_fix} Warp Heat upon Inoculator activation
+2% Heat damage for every Pyromancy skill mounted (in the skill slots)
{physical_damage,100} damage to Phsyical skills when the character's Warp Heat status is below Exposed
Unlocks the Phase Through (Armour Piercing) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Matter Displacement (Armour Breaking) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Telekinetic Shock (Knockback) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Telekinetic Blast (Knockdown) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Temporal Stasis (Stun) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Hinder Movement (Slow) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Psychic Shackles (Shock) mastery
Unlocks the Blindness psychic mastery
Unlocks the Vulnerability psychic mastery
Unlocks the Damage over Time psychic mastery
Unlocks the Warp Scourge (damage conversion) psychic mastery
+25% damage to psyker skills for 10 seconds when Warp Heat changes to a higher status
Unlocks the Exploit Weakness (Critical Hit) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Dismantle (Suppression damage) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Demolition (Cover damage) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Health Stimulus (HP per hit) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Suppression Stimulus (Suppression per hit) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Symbiosis (Target ally) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Knit Flesh (HP regen) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Regain Composure (Suppression regen) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Deny the Warp (Warp resist) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Speed Boost (Movement speed) psychic mastery
Unlocks the Damage Boost (All damage) psychic mastery
{damage,100} damage to all Force weapon skills
+10% Warp Damage, but -10% Warp Resistance.
+1% Damage after every other acquired skill from the Radical path.
Incoming Warp damage has a 10% chance to heal you instead of harming you.
3% chance to reflect incoming attacks to the attacker with Warp damage type.
Each killed enemy creates a Harvested Soul bonus (stacks 10 times) that bestows +10% Critical Hit Strength. A succesful critical hit removes all instances of the Harvested Soul bonus.
Taking any damage creates a Blood Focus effect that bestows +5% Damage for 1 second (does not stack).
Provides bonus to Damage proportional to the amount of missing Health (to a maximum of 10%).
+5% Damage against Xenos, Chaos and Renegade enemies.
Incoming attacks with Warp damage type are reflected to the attacker, dealing 30% of the original damage amount.
Taking any Warp damage creates a Holy Rage effect for 3 seconds that bestows +20% Warp Resistance and +5% Damage (does not stack).
+20% Damage against Daemons.
Incoming attacks from Xenos, Chaos and Renegade enemies deal 5% less damage.
+4% Maximum Health and +2% Damage to you and nearby allies (stacks with other players' Holy Conclave).
Each killed Daemon bestows +20% Health regeneration and +20% Suppression regeneration for 5 seconds.
